title: data from Section 1.8
description:
Description
The larynx data frame has 90 rows and 5 columns.
usage: This data frame contains the following columns:
reference:
Klein and Moeschberger (1997) Survival Analysis Techniques for Censored
and truncated data, Springer.
Kardaun Stat. Nederlandica 37 (1983), 103-126.

parameters.age: Age at diagnosis of larynx cancer
parameters.time: Time to death or on-study time, months
parameters.diagyr: Year of diagnosis of larynx cancer
